channel.title: Softlayer_billing_invoice_tax_type on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_invoice_tax_type on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type Service Datatype Description Invoice tax types allows the SoftLayer system to categorize the different strategies we use to calculate the tax for any invoice. There are three basic strategies in our system: don’t calculate tax at all, use a basic, location-based set of rules, or offload the tax calculation to a third party that will take all related factors into account. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Status

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Tax_Type Service Datatype Description The invoice tax type data type models a single strategy for handling tax calculations. Local id A tax type's internal identifier. Each type of tax calculation strategy has a unique ID value. Type: integer keyName A unique string that identifies each strategy and is guaranteed to be stable over time. Type: string name A human-readable label for each tax strategy.
